work.name: RIKEN Nishina Center
highlights: Performed Fourier analysis on large datasets using Python with Pandas, pinpointing and correcting critical flaws in power supplies.
Developed nuclear mass analysis software in Python (PyQt GUI) and C++ (ROOT framework), with additional features for beta-decay correlations to improve signal-to-noise ratio.
Wrote optimization scripts in Lua with the Simplex method, used to search for optimal configuration in MRTOF, resulting in increase of tuning speed by more than 100 fold.
